projects.title: Dubai Infrastructure Development
projects.description: Supplied premium construction materials including steel beams, cement, and aggregates for a major residential complex development.

projects.title: European Automotive Fleet Export
projects.description: Facilitated the export of 150 luxury vehicles from European manufacturers to North American dealerships.

projects.title: Mining Equipment Supply - Chile
projects.description: Delivered heavy mining equipment including excavators, bulldozers, and processing machinery to copper mining operations.

projects.title: Organic Spice Export Program
projects.description: Ongoing supply of premium organic spices including turmeric, cardamom, and black pepper to European food manufacturers.

projects.title: Steel Scrap Recycling Initiative
projects.description: Large-scale steel scrap collection and processing for recycling into new construction materials.

projects.title: Agricultural Machinery - Brazil
projects.description: Supplied modern agricultural equipment including tractors, harvesters, and irrigation systems to large farming operations.
